strip-path

Strip a path from a path

Install

$ npm install --save strip-path

Example

stripPath('path1/path2/path3/path4', 'path1/path2');
//=> 'path3/path4'

API

stripPath(path, stripPath)

path

Required
Type: String

The path to stripped.

stripPath

Required
Type: String

The path to strip from path.
